english.segment1: Living in fear is not what you had in mind for me. But holding to you is so hard, I cling to what I see
english.segment2: CHORUS(*): In a world where my emotions. Seem to rule my every move. They will challenge my devotion. To seek and know the truth
english.segment3: CHORUS: Youre piercing me. This self will bleed. Youre killing all of my securities. Lord, help me see the reality. That all Ill ever need is You
english.segment4: Here in this haze a distant light seems to draw me near. But in the shadow of my doubt. My faith just disappears
